request.description:
See ticket AEA-479

 Organization needs to be from the users card and needs an Organization Name (AEA-479) and Organization Type

 Organization nmme and cost centre name needs same Cost centre details as Cost Centre in Medication Request section (see powerpoint presentaton)

exec: pm.test("Body matches and contains a Professional code", function () {
pm.test("ODS Code is GPhC Number (Pharmacist prescriber NNNNNNN)  (Element Attribute)",
let code = $('ParentPrescription > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > author > AgentPerson > agentPerson id').attr('extension');
let root = $('ParentPrescription > pertinentInformation1 > pertinentPrescription > author > AgentPerson > agentPerson id').attr('root');

request.description:
https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/Id/gphc-number

{
    "resourceType": "NamingSystem",
    "id": "uk-gphc-number",
    "name": "General Pharmaceutical Council number",
    "status": "draft",
    "kind": "identifier",
    "date": "2019-12-03",
    "publisher": "HL7 UK",
    "responsible": "General Pharmaceutical Council",
    "description": "General Pharmaceutical Council number",
    "usage": "A unique reference number, used to identify pharmacists",
    "uniqueId":  [
        {
            "type": "uri",
            "value": "https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/Id/gphc-number",
            "preferred": true
        }
    ]
}
